synopsis.text:
On the brink of 2035, a world unified under a single global government and dominated by a colossal multinational corporation, technology has seeped into every crevice of life. Advanced computer systems, immersive audio/video multimedia, and relentless network wars waged by hackers paint the landscape of the future. Enter GEONOID, a disaster management firm, tasked with safeguarding Earth from natural catastrophes.

At the tender age of 14, Kang Maru, a prodigy with unparalleled skills in the RESTOL simulation game, is handpicked by GEONOID to pilot the mighty RESTOL-03. As part of an elite team operating one of five specialized rescue robots, Kang Maru's mission is to save lives amidst devastating calamities.

But danger lurks in unexpected corners. As Kang Maru and his team bravely face the challenges of their rescue missions, they find their space-based rescue station, R-SAT, under the threat of hacking.

'RESTOL: The Special Rescue Squad', inspired by the Korean animation demo film 'Rescue 119', is a thrilling tale of courage, technology, and the indomitable human spirit, produced by renowned Korean companies.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
